attributes.action: Make cannabis legal for medical and recreational use in the UK
attributes.additional_details:
Legalising the sale of cannabis in specialist shops would generate £1bn + a year in tax revenue and reduce the harm done to users and society.

This would stop making criminals of people who want to smoke the herb its not man made and is naturally grown

There's been thousands of deaths caused by alcohol and none caused by naturally grown cannabis only when these black market dealers mix it with something els

Let's face it the UK has lost the war on cannabis so why not work with it to our advantage
attributes.background:
cannabis should be legal for medical and recreational use in the UK 

The government can then tax this product and put the money back into Britain and the NHS to help our economic crisis
